title: Does the Pixel 3 and 3a support the new Hold For Me option?
content: I received an email from Google telling me about the new "Hold For Me' functionality. The email provides a link to Use Hold for Me - Phone app Help (google.com) this article says the 3a supports the new function. I've updated my 3a to the latest versions of everything, but within the Phone settings there's no sign of "Hold for Me". What's up? Do I need to do anything else to get this functionality on my 3a? Please advise...
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
